days.introduction: Welcome to the first day of the Family Fun Challenge! Over the next week, we will be focusing on activities that promote togetherness and joy within the family. Each day will feature a new task for you to complete together.

messages.content: Get ready for today's task: To strengthen your bond, spend at least 1 hour playing a board game together as a family.

options.text: Spend at least 1 hour playing a board game together as a family.

days.title: Family Bonding

name: Relative Icon Challenge

messages.content: Tomorrow you will embark on the Family Fun Challenge! Prepare yourselves for a week of bonding and joy.

targetAudience: Families looking to bond and have fun together.
